name: Dodge 'em Up (GDP UFRJ)
description:
A score attack game where you dodge the incoming missiles for as long as possible.

Programming & Art - Matheus Pinheiro

Music & SFX - José Luiz de Avellar / Zero Steele

Leaderboards require installing through the Google Play Store to work.

Originally meant for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.
